homePage.sectionOneContentA: Protect your privacy with Jumping Spider's global VPN service.
homePage.sectionOneContentB: With fast connection speeds and servers in multiple countries,
homePage.sectionOneContentC: you can access any content anytime, anywhere.
homePage.sectionTwoContentA: Access high-quality URL connection VPN services with just a simple monthly payment.
homePage.sectionTwoContentB: For corporate users, customized services are available, allowing VPN connections using URLs or certificates, creating a unique network environment.
homePage.sectionThreeContent: Install OpenVPN, enter the URL or certificate provided by Jumping Spider, and easily establish a secure connection locally to access devices and explore endless possibilities within the virtual network.
homePage.sectionFourContentC: Certificates empower you to direct VPN connections to specific devices,
homePage.sectionFiveTitle: Embark on your Jumping Spider journey
homePage.sectionFiveContent: Subscribe to Jumping Spider VPN now to create your exclusive secure tunnel and unlock a new world of online freedom.

pricePage.description: Embark on an adventure journey, instantly enjoy exclusive VPN services, and protect your internet security.
pricePage.planDescription: Jumping Spider VPN offers comprehensive custom services for enterprise clients, ensuring security, stability, unified management, consistent pricing strategies, and the best VPN solution.
pricePage.featureThree: Virtual Network Experience without Regional Restrictions
pricePage.reminder: Transaction confirmation requires 10 to 15 minutes. Please check the OpenVPN connection information in the Member Center later.
pricePage.failed: Payment failed. Please check if there is insufficient virtual currency balance or a technical issue with the platform.

faqPage.title: FAQ
faqPage.description: The Spiderweb team is always ready to provide fast and reliable assistance, ensuring a worry-free and smooth VPN experience for you.
faqPage.questionOne: How to install and configure OpenVPN？
faqPage.questionTwo: How to synchronize the use of Jumping Spider VPN on different devices？
faqPage.questionThree: What options are available for customized services at the enterprise side？
faqPage.questionFour: Payment is only supported through virtual currency wallets. Are there any other options available？
faqPage.answerOne: We have a detailed installation guide available in the [ <tutorial>OpenVPN Tutorial</tutorial> ], with clear and straightforward steps. If you require further assistance, please feel free to contact us. Our customer service team will be happy to help you complete the setup.
faqPage.answerTwo: Jumping Spider supports account synchronization. You can easily achieve cross-device synchronization by logging into different devices with the same account. If you encounter any issues during the process, our customer service is always available to assist you.
faqPage.answerThree: Our enterprise-side customization services cover various aspects, including setting up dedicated VPN servers based on corporate needs, customizing security protocols, and integrating internal corporate identity verification systems. Please contact our enterprise customer service directly for a detailed explanation to ensure that your company's unique requirements are met.
faqPage.answerFour: Currently, we only accept virtual currency wallets as a method of payment. We are continuously working to expand our payment options to provide more convenient choices. If you have any questions or suggestions regarding payment, please feel free to contact customer service, and we will be dedicated to assisting you.
